com.intel.icecp.core

Interface Network<T extends Network.Endpoint>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the endpoint descriptor type specific to each network
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NdnNetwork

    public interface Network<T extends Network.Endpoint>
    Represent a network of connected nodes; implementing classes should be written as service providers (https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/sound/SPI-intro.html) and included by adding a line with the class name (e.g. com.implementing.network.class) to META-INF/services/com.intel.icecp.core.Network.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Network.Endpoint
      Represent an endpoint in the network; implement a subclass of this for each network type (e.g.

      Advertise the local() endpoint on the network; a corresponding discover() from another endpoint should return this endpoint's information.

    • Method Detail

      • scheme

        String scheme()
        Returns:
        the protocol scheme of the network implemented (e.g. "ndn")

      • local

        T local()
        Returns:
        an Network.Endpoint representing the current, local Node

      • list

        T[] list()
        Returns:
        a list of all known, non-local endpoints that are connected to local()

      • connect

        CompletableFuture<Void> connect(T endpoint)
                         throws IOException
        Add an endpoint to the network
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the Network.Endpoint to add
        Returns:
        a future that completes when all network IO is finished
        Throws:
        IOException - if the connection fails

      • disconnect

        CompletableFuture<Void> disconnect(T endpoint)
                            throws IOException
        Remove an endpoint from the network
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the Network.Endpoint to remove
        Returns:
        a future that completes when all network IO is finished
        Throws:
        IOException - if the disconnection fails

      • advertise

        CompletableFuture<Void> advertise()
                           throws IOException
        Advertise the local() endpoint on the network; a corresponding discover() from another endpoint should return this endpoint's information.
        Returns:
        a future that completes when all network IO is finished
        Throws:
        IOException - if the advertisement fails

      • discover

        CompletableFuture<T[]> discover()
                         throws IOException
        Returns:
        the list of advertising endpoints (see advertise()) that are reachable from this endpoint.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the discovery operation fails

      • rtt

        CompletableFuture<Integer> rtt(T endpoint)
                        throws IOException
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the Network.Endpoint to measure
        Returns:
        the round-trip time (in milliseconds) to reach a distant endpoint over the network
        Throws:
        IOException - if the round-trip time operation fails
